title: Clockwork orange [DVD] (D)
creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Polaris Productions and Stanley Kubrick
brief_description: Nominated for four Academy Awards in 1971, ‘A Clockwork Orange’ is a harrowing journey through a near-future world of decaying cities, murderous adolescents and nightmarish technologies of punishment and crime. Set in London it centres around a teenager called Alex (Malcolm McDowell) who is switched on by violence and rape, and surprisingly by Beethoven, and who leads a gang of cool thugs.
